title: 5 Minute Morning Yoga to Energize and Remove Sleepiness
description:
This is a short 5 minute movement yoga class to energize and get you ready for a great day.
🧘 Breathe and Flow yoga wolfpack platform (free 7 day trial!): https://practice.breatheandflow.yoga
🌈 Daily yoga 30 day calendars: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/ritual
🐺 Join the wolfpack:
https://www.instagram.com/breatheandflow
https://www.tiktok.com/@breatheandflow
https://www.youtube.com/breatheandflow
https://twitter.com/breatheandflow

📚 Book and equipment suggestions: https://bit.ly/bnfkits
🛜 Website: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga
💬 Join the discussion: https://bit.ly/3z8P1JU
🎧 Music for yoga: https://spoti.fi/3gpV2c6
🍄 Mushroom supplements (use code BREATHEFLOW): https://bit.ly/3xjrIOI
🔥 Our medicine family and shamans: https://bit.ly/2Ufi4fW
☯️ Structural integration bodywork with Flo: https://bit.ly/FLO-SI

Music: ANBR - Skin

00:00 Intro
01:00 Practice

Love and Gratitude,
Bre & Flo

***

Breathe and Flow is a travel, yoga and lifestyle channel owned by Bre and Flo Niedhammer. Knowing that the body benefits from movement while the mind benefits from stillness, we share our philosophy of mental stillness through the fluidity of a strong practice. Bre and Flo are Registered Yoga Teachers (RYT) with Yoga Alliance® holding the highest certifications as E-RYT500, and are also Yoga Alliance Continuing Education Providers (YACEP). Combined they are trained in Vinyasa yoga, Hatha yoga, Yin yoga, Myofascial Release (MFR), Reiki, pre- and postnatal yoga, Functional Movement Screen (FMS) Level 1 and 2, Animal Flow, Kinstretch, Functional Range Conditioning (FRC) mobility training, Functional Range Assessment (FRA) and structural bodywork (Anatomy Trains). Bre and Flo have taught at several premium yoga studios for many years and are teaching their teacher trainings, retreats, workshops and at festivals around the world. They currently live in Las Vegas, Nevada. Learn more about them and their certifications on their website: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/about

Our disclaimer: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/disclaimer

#breatheandflow #yoga #yogawithbnf
channelDescription: We teach yoga retreats, teacher trainings and online classes to help you live your most authentic life. Learn more https://www.bnf.yoga ❤️🙏

comments:
Your channel has been a LIFE changer for me. I've lost 71lbs over the last year RELIGIOUSLY watching your content. My mobility, flexibility and overall general mental well-being have drastically improved because of you and Bre. The only time I weight lift (which I used to do 5 days a week, with little improvement and a costly gym membership), is work on back exercises with lightweight dumbbells.

❤❤ I genuinely cannot thank you enough ❤❤
I really can't express just how much I enjoy these practices. The softness, the generosity, and spaciousness. I love you guys. Thank you. 😊❤🙏

I’m happy I discovered this video! Thank you for making it! 😊
Just want to thank u for being an inspiration. I’ve been watching and doing morning exercises daily for a few months. What a lifestyle changer 🙏🏽
